channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Fallen branches outside no 16 need clearing away.

item.title: Wire trip hazard in alleyway leading from High St to Minster, 28th November
item.description:
In the alleyway from the High St next to Paparittos there is a loop of wire/ cable mostly across the alleyway causing a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 208 High Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Flytipping, 28th November
item.description:
Rubbish opposite Sycamore Court, Springbank Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Sycamore Court, Cheltenham

item.title: Missing Traffic Lights, 28th November
item.description:
The right hand side of the road (coming from the roundabout) is missing a set of traffic lights on the crossing completely. This is very dangerous as we were on red so pedestrians could cross and a car ran the lights (as no lights their side) and nearly took out a pedestrian. Needs fixing asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brook Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering, 28th November
item.description:
Constant littering by the residents of number 29 Boverton Drive. Starts off on their drive and swiftly makes it way down the road and into hedges. Damaging the environment and harming wildlife. Regularly dump their rubbish on the road and street as they walk out of their house / Car. Wilful fly tipping and littering daily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Boverton Drive, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing drain cover, 27th November
item.description:
There is a missing drain cover on the downward section of the a40 150m from the Dowdeswell junction. Major safety issue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 27th November
item.description:
Outside 2 Brooklyn Road, reported previously but no action taken yet. Capable of serious damage to vehicles as you can't avoid it without swerving into oncoming traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Green Barriers- fibre optic work, 24th November
item.description:
Everyday the green barriers, used where the fibre optic work is being done, are blown over, causing an obstruction and posing a danger. The photos are of Oldbury Rd, Oldbury Close and the entrance to Falkland Place (where gaps in the pavement covers pose an extra risk to pedestrians and cyclists). These barriers are not fit for purpose. In addition the management of traffic where work is taking place is extremely unsatisfactory, leading to grid lock at busy periods. GCC please inspect whats in place and enforce proper management.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Farm Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drainage causing pavement flooding, 23rd November
item.description:
Drains blocked downstream causing water to emit from the drain and cause road and pavement flooding toward town The drain is out side 213 Prestbury road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 213 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More potholes have opened up and gotten deeper in Pothole alley!, 23rd November
item.description:
This area is effectively one big pothole with potholes getting potholes! Some of the existing and filled in potholes have gotten deeper and are making driving through this piece of road difficult. Please can the potholes be filled in or better still, this section of road resurfaced - it saves damaging the off road edges which have to be used to avoid the potholes!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes before and after this corner, 23rd November
item.description:
There are at least 3 potholes around this corner starting from the the entry to it and again on the exit. They are in the wheel track of vehicles entering and exiting this corner and have gotten deep with sharp edges. Please can they be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hewletts Farm Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
